critical to realizing the full economic benefits of GAI but lag behind

The massive economic potential

Meanwhile, medium businesses are more likely to have a strategy for

38% of businesses indicated that creating GAI adoption grants and 
subsidies for SMBs would significantly reduce the barriers associated with deploying GAI solutions
